title: Youtube - Stack Basics
description: These are beginner friendly videos to get you started into the field of Binary Exploitation.

title: Return to Shellcode [train 1]
description: Welcome to the world of Binary Exploitation!

title: Format String Exploitation [train 2]
description: This is the 2nd challenge in the in the series. In this training we will go through the format string exploitation technique. We are provided 2 challenges of the same vulnerability. Lets go through them one by one.

title: Ret-to-libc [train 3]
description: In this blog we will be trying to leak a libc address and try to get a shell by calling system. Here we will look into 2 challenges with similar attacks but slight variations.

title: Checkpoint [train 4]
description: This level acts as a checkpoint (name suggests). You will be combining the idea of format strings, buffer overflows, canaries from previous blogposts.

title: Browser Exploitation
description: This is my current area of research. I look mostly into v8, which is chrome browser's Javascript Engine. This contains cves and related topic.

title: Heap Exploitation
description: Collection of Heap challenges in CTFs I found interesting.

title: Stack Exploitation
description: This contains most of the basic stack based exploitation techniques and challenges, I solved. They are mostly x86 64 bit excecutables.
